long_description: This Thule(R) adapter connects your Flat Top(TM) ski/snowboard carrier or your Big Mouth Bike Mount(TM) onto the Xsporter(TM) truck rack. Adapts and connects your 724 or 725 Flat Top(TM) horizontal ski/snowboard carrier to your Xsporter(TM) truck rack. Adapts and connects your Big Mouth(TM) upright bike carrier to your Xsporter truck rack.
short_description: This Thule(R) adapter connects your Flat Top(TM) ski/snowboard carrier or your Big Mouth Bike Mount(TM) onto the Xsporter(TM) truck rack.
